page.title: 01PLAYING-FISHBOURNE
page.content: When we moved to Fishbourne about ten years ago a lot of new houses were being built which meant lots of children were able to play on the road.But since then, things have {changed}and we get{complaints}about being noisy.But the only place we can play is the{playing field.}But alot of children are not allowed to go there,and the farmers have closed off their fields.There is one place where we could play which is{The Creek}but with the {A27}which you have to cross, a lot of children are not allowed to go there.Fishbourne is becoming a { {retirment}area now.But the children who live there still have quite a lot of fun and during our childhood we would not like to move away.
